subject: Chronic Traumatic Encephalopathy
Concussions
Football
Brain
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: Tyler Sash, who played on the 2012 Super Bowl team, was found dead in September after an accidental overdose of pain medication. His family said his behavior had become increasingly erratic.
